Issue.creator: tongliofcary
Issue.summary: Allow resource allocation for k8s install
Issue.description: Ansible agent now can be used to install fabric network onto an existing k8s env. But fabric pods are not providing required and memory and cpu requirement, this makes k8s pods scheduler won't be able to place pods correctly or limit the number of pods running on a k8s cluster node, we need to add the resource tags for the pods deployment.
